'''Swimming Prohibited''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Coral Defenders|Bathysmal Vishap Herd]] without allowing them to dive into the water.

==Notes==
* Killing the vishaps at the same time will prevent them from diving into the water to perform their Critical Assist move.
